name: Barbed
desc: Jagged hooks or spines along the piece.

name: Bitter
desc: Looks/smells/tastes unpleasant.

name: Bleeding
desc: Oozes a tiny trickle of blood while held/worn.

name: Brilliant
desc: Brief flash of bright light on activation.

name: Clean
desc: Never becomes stained or dirty.

name: Comfortable
desc: Soothing/relaxing to wear or hold.

name: Crude
desc: Base materials; workmanship looks shoddy.

name: Dreadful
desc: Frightening emblems that seem to move on use.

name: Fashionable
desc: Particularly attractive/aesthetic.

name: Flickering
desc: Faint black flame flickersâ€”no illumination.

name: Gaudy
desc: Bright colors or many fake jewels; faint rainbow shimmer.

name: Glowing
desc: Sheds candle-level light for 1 round on activation/charge use.

name: Heavy
desc: Feels unusually heavy (actual weight unchanged).

name: Loud
desc: Emits incongruous sound (roar/chord/exclamation) on use.

name: Multicolored
desc: Coloration shifts at random intervals.

name: Religious
desc: Bears a deity/faith symbol and relevant colors/icons.

name: Shadowy
desc: Dead black; seems to swallow light.

name: Shrouded
desc: Perpetually wreathed in faint cool mist.

name: Sizzling
desc: Faint burning hiss when it strikes flesh (fits shield bashes).

name: Slimy
desc: Ever-present thin slime residue; no transfer to hands.

name: Smoky
desc: Leaves a faint smoke trail when held.

name: Sparking
desc: Throws sparks when it strikes or is struck (fits shield bashes).

name: Totemic
desc: Fetishes/carvings/markings of a specific tribe/group.

name: Warped
desc: Odd curves/protrusions; unconventional construction.

name: Writhing
desc: Briefly twists/writhes like a snake on activation.
